titles.title: American Shipbuilding Jobs Preservation Act
To amend title 46, United States Code, to prohibit overhaul, repair, and maintenance of Coast Guard vessels in foreign shipyards.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Navigation.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.4422.

bill.summary: 6/28/1994--Introduced. American Shipbuilding Jobs Preservation Act - Amends Federal law to prohibit Coast Guard vessels from being overhauled, repaired (except for emergency repairs), or maintained in a foreign shipyard.
